title: Bracing For an Energy Shock
itunes:title: Bracing For an Energy Shock
description:
Ahead of regulator Ofgem announcing a massive increase in the energy price cap on Friday, our reporter Lizzy Burden talks us through what's expected. Ipsos UK & Ireland CEO Kelly Beaver tells Bloomberg's Yuan Potts and Stephen Carroll that public concern about inflation has risen to its highest level in 40 years. Plus: Opinion columnist Therese Raphael and Bloomberg Intelligence's Sam Fazeli discuss the monkeypox outbreak, and the challenges of sourcing and rolling out vaccines. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
